species.name: crustle
descriptions: Competing for territory, Crustle fight viciously. The one whose boulder is broken is the loser of the battle.
It possesses legs of enormous strength, enabling it to carry heavy slabs for many days, even when crossing arid land.
Its thick claws are its greatest weapons. They’re mighty enough to crack Rhyperior’s carapace.
This highly territorial Pokémon prefers dry climates. It won’t come out of its boulder on rainy days.
When its boulder is broken in battles for territory, it feels unsure and begins to weaken.

abilities.name: sturdy
abilities.effect: Prevents being KOed from full HP, leaving 1 HP instead.  Protects against the one-hit KO moves regardless of HP.

abilities.name: weak-armor
abilities.effect: Raises Speed and lowers Defense by one stage each upon being hit by a physical move.
